description: This file defines the QAViewModel class, which manages conversation state for a chat interface. It handles user questions, interacts with a QARepository to fetch answers, and maintains a LiveData list of message objects representing chat history.

classes.name: QAViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel managing chat conversation state, handling questions, and interacting with backend API through QARepository.

methods.name: ask
methods.description: Sends a user question to the backend API, appends the user message to conversation, and updates the chat with the assistant's response or an error message.

methods.name: append
methods.description: Appends a new Message object to the current conversation list and updates LiveData.
